name: Sleeping Cooty
description:
Sleeping Cooty

Coots is peacefully sleeping on a meadow, but Ludwig wants to go home!

Play as Swift or Ders to defend Coots from Ludwig and his slimy slimes.

Use a variety of abilities, decided via dice roll. Abilities can be rerolled after a short cooldown, but will automatically reroll at some point.

Controls:
Left stick/WASD to move
Right stick/Mouse to aim
A/R to reroll
Use A/Spacebar to close the level up prompt

Developers:
Art: Quakmann
Code: hawos
